ERROR: An unexpected error occured while working on that action, please try again later or [contact us](https://athena.bot/support).
BOT_INSUFFICIENT_PERMS: Athena does not have enough perms to do that action, plase consider checking Athena's role perms/role hiearchy.
USER_INSUFFICIENT_PERMS: You don't have enough perms to do that action.
SPECIFY_USER: Please, specify a valid user (*mention or specify the id of the user*).
WRONG_COMMAND_USAGE: You have used this command wrong, please consider getting mode info [on our site](https://athena.bot/commands) about this command
COOLDOWN_WARNING: Woah, you have used this command too many times, please wait a while to use it again.
